alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 3:29AM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River from Dubuque downstream to New Boston. Affecting all counties along the Mississippi River. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued this afternoon. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Bellevue LD12. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 19.2 feet, Basement flooding occurs in homes and businesses with seepage into a few yards in Savanna. Water seeps into yards on Pearl and Broad Streets in Sabula. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning and continue rising to 19.1 feet Monday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
